solution_line_template: Lily planted {ava_planted}-{more_than_lily} = <<{ava_planted}-{more_than_lily}={lily_planted}>>{lily_planted} apple trees in her backyard.
They planted {ava_planted}+{lily_planted} = <<{ava_planted}+{lily_planted}={total_planted}>>{total_planted} apple trees in their backyards collectively.
